name: Jollof Rice
description: A delicious West African rice dish cooked in tomato sauce and spices.

name: Egusi Soup
description: A thick and hearty Nigerian soup made with ground melon seeds, spinach, and assorted meats.

name: Suya
description: Spicy grilled skewered meat, commonly served with onions and tomatoes.

name: Pounded Yam & Efo Riro
description: Smooth pounded yam served with rich and flavorful spinach stew cooked with assorted meats.

name: Moi Moi
description: Steamed bean pudding made with blended beans, peppers, and spices.

name: Akara
description: Deep-fried bean cakes made from ground beans, onions, and peppers.

name: Ofada Rice & Ayamase (Designer Stew)
description: Local Ofada rice served with spicy green pepper sauce and assorted meats.

name: Boli & Groundnut
description: Grilled plantain served with roasted groundnuts.
